trans-unit.source: Describes the session-state type used when installing a session-state database provider.
trans-unit.target: 描述在安装会话状态数据库提供程序时所使用的会话状态类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.SessionStateType> enumeration with the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices.InstallSessionState%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices> type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Management.SessionStateType>枚举<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices.InstallSessionState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices>类型。

trans-unit.source: Session-state data and stored procedures are placed in a custom data store.
trans-unit.target: 会话状态数据和存储过程放在自定义的数据存储区中。

trans-unit.source: Session-state data and stored procedures are placed in the "ASPState" database.
trans-unit.target: 会话状态数据和存储过程放在“ASPState”数据库中。

trans-unit.source: Session-state data will survive a restart of the database server.
trans-unit.target: 在数据库服务器重新启动后，会话状态数据不会丢失。

trans-unit.source: Session state data is stored in tempdb, and stored procedures are placed in the "ASPState" database.
trans-unit.target: 会话状态数据存储在 tempdb 中，存储过程放在“ASPState”数据库中。

trans-unit.source: Session state data will not survive a restart of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 重新启动后，会话状态数据将会丢失。
